content: stitch guide double_crochet double_crochet * insert hook in stitch yarn over pull up loop yarn over and draw through 2 loops on hook repeat from * half treble half_double_crochet * yarn over insert hook in stitch yarn over pull up loop yarn over and draw through all three loops on hook repeat from* treble treble_crochet * yarn over insert hook in stitch yarn over pull up loop yarn over and draw through two loops yarn over and draw through two remaining loops on hook repeat from* treble 2 together decrease treble_crochet 2 decrease yarn over insert hook in stitch yarn over pull up loop 3 loops on hook yarn over draw through 2 loops 2 loops left on hook yarn over and insert hook in next stitch yarn over pull up loop yarn over draw through 2 loops 3 loops left on hook yarn over and draw through all 3 loops on hook special stitches cluster stitch 1 yarn over insert hook into space yarn over draw up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over draw through 2 loops 2 loops remain on hook 2 yarn over insert hook into same space yarn over draw up a loop yarn over draw through 2 loops on hook 3 loops on hook 3 yarn over insert hook into same space yarn over draw up a loop yarn over draw through 2 loops on hook 4 loops on hook 4 yarn over insert hook into same space yarn over draw up a loop yarn over draw through 2 loops on hook 5 loops on hook yarn over draw through all loops on hook chain 1 to secure the stitch cluster completed cluster stitch pattern repeat row 1 ch1 work 1 double_crochet in same stitch chain 1 skip at and double_crochet in next st *chain 1 skip 1 chain double_crochet in next chain repeat from * then slip_stitch to starting double_crochet to complete round row 2 chain 3 work cluster in each chain-1 space across join with slip_stitch in top of ch3 row 3 chain 1 double_crochet in same st ch1 double_crochet in chain-space before first cluster *chain 1 double_crochet in next chain-space between clusters repeat from * across working one double_crochet in chain-space after last cluster and 1 double_crochet in top of starting ch3 repeat row 2-3 to desired length jacket - size 0-3m using dk weight yarn usa light worsted and 4mm hook to start yoke chain chain 50 place a stitch marker in the 1stand 48thch st pic 1 row 1 treble_crochet into 4thch from hook not counting the loop around the hook as a chain and into each chain to end turn 48 sts row 2 ch2 counts as 1st stitch skip 1stst 2tr into next st *treble_crochet into next 3 sts 2tr into next st repeat from * to end treble_crochet into last st treble_crochet into 3rd chain of the ch3 turn 60 sts row 3 ch2 counts as 1st stitch skip 1stst treble_crochet into next 8 sts
